about_the_game: Rolled: A Pinball Nightmare is a pinball horror adventure game. This is the demo version. In the full version, you will bounce and ping your way through a nonlinear world in hopes to get back to the life you were living before.
detailed_description: Rolled: A Pinball Nightmare is a pinball horror adventure game. This is the demo version. In the full version, you will bounce and ping your way through a nonlinear world in hopes to get back to the life you were living before.
name: Rolled: A Pinball Nightmare Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The demo of a pinball horror adventure game. Bounce and ping your way through the demo section.
